data.title: Nest verch Rhys Princess of Deheubarth
data.text:
Family Links

Spouses/Children:

1. Henry I "Beauclerc" King of England

Henry Fitz Henry+

2. Gerard Fitz Walter Constable of Pembroke Castle

William Fitz Gerard+

Maurice Fitz Gerald+

Nest verch Rhys Princess of Deheubarth

Born: Abt 1073, Dynevor, Wales

Relationship (1): Henry I "Beauclerc" King of England

Marriage (2): Gerard Fitz Walter Constable of Pembroke Castle 141,736

Another name for Nest was Nesta verch Rhys o Deheubarth.

General Notes:

~ Cokayne's Complete Peerage, 2nd Edition, Vol. VII, "The Geraldine" pedigree chart, p. 200, given as the wife of Gerald of Windsor, and mother of William Fitz Gerald and Maurice Fitz Gerald of Windsor. 141

~Ancestral Roots of Certain American Colonists Who Came to America before 1700, 8th Edition, 33A:23, 178:1-2, Nesta of Wales, daughter of Rhys Ap Tudor Mawr, Prince of south Wales, and his wife Gwladus, daughter of Rhiwallon ap Cynfyn of Powys parented Henry Fitz Henry with King Henry I of England, and later married Gerald of Windsor, Constable of Pembroke Castle. 160

Information about this person:

 Background Information. 141

Gerald Fitz Walter of Windsor married Nest, daughter of Rhys ap Tudor Mawr, Prince of South Wales. The date of his death is not known, presumably before 1136.

~ Cokayne's Complete Peerage, 2nd Edition, Vol. X, p. 11

 Background Information. 991

Nesta, daughter of Rhys ap Gruffydh ap Tudor Mawr, Prince of South Wales was known for her beauty. She had been a mistress of Henry I, and was mother by him of Robert of Gloucester and of Meyler Fitz Henry. She afterwards married Stephen, constable of Cardigan, by whom she had one son, Robert Fitz Stephen. After the death of her first husband, she married Gerald Fitz Walter. With Gerald, Nesta had three sons, Maurice, William and David.

~ The Earls of Kildare, pp. 3-4

Nest had a relationship with Henry I "Beauclerc" King of England, son of William I "The Conqueror" de Normandy King Of England and Matilda de Flandres et de Falaise. (Henry I "Beauclerc" King of England was born about 1070 in Selby, Yorkshire, England,528 died on 1 Dec 1135 in St. Denis-le-Fermont, Near Gisors 528 and was buried in Reading Abbey, Berkshire, England.)

Nest next married Gerard Fitz Walter Constable of Pembroke Castle, son of Walter Fitz Otho and Gwladus verch Rhiwallon 141.,739 (Gerard Fitz Walter Constable of Pembroke Castle was born in 1065-1070 in Windsor, Berkshire, England and died about 1136 in England.)
